channel.title: Help me please
channel.description:
ok ive been trying to make skill capes work on my server im using dodian (devolution v7) but when i equip the capes it goes into my weapon slot and i cant fix it idk how to can anyone help ive added capes to items.java and all that but thiers no place i can add to fix the weilding it in weapon slot??
please help or come on my server and be my coder m8s :D
dodianv7pwns.no-ip.biz

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You probably added it into the wrong int or incorrectly added it. No advertising, by the way.

Read full topic
